title: where text is a text constant or text expression. The data supplied must be in the form HH:MM:SS. Seconds are optional, and AM and PM may be used as suffixes

note: Example: The following expression yields 5/28/2002 14:15:00: GetAsTimestamp (“05/28/2002 2:15 pm”
title: where text is a text constant or text expression, formatted as a date followed by a time. A single integer is interpreted as the number of seconds since 00:00:00 on 01/01/0001
